About DSLEUTH
=============

A distributed framework for running the SLEUTH application and a parallel version of the SLEUTH using OpenMP. SLEUTH was originally developed by Project Gigalopolis. The website where more information about the model and the original source code can be found |sleuth link|.

.. |sleuth link| raw:: html

	<a href="http://www.ncgia.ucsb.edu/projects/gig/index.html" target="_blank">here</a>
